article: Do you know pigeons ? They are a  kind of  bird. They are   _  and gray. Some people say they are not  _ , but they are cute and  _ . Many people keep them as pets.  _  do people say pigeons are smart? Because pigeons can  _  letters from  _  place to another . And they know how to  get  home. We often  _  the pictures of pigeons with olive branch in  _  mouths. We give the name--peace pigeons  to them. They are the symbol of peace.
